mapper.select: select * from packageattcate where pName like '${pName}%' and erpCode = '${erpCode}'
mapper.insert: insert into packageattcate (id, entId, erpCode, pCode, pName, requiredCount, pEnName,parentCode, `status`, `level`, leafFlag, lang, creator,createDate, modifier, updateDate) select uuid_short(), `entId`, `erpCode`, #{newPCode}, #{newPName}, requiredCount, pEnName, parentCode,`status`, `level`, leafFlag, lang,#{creator}, now(), #{creator}, now() from packageattcate where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select count(1) from packageattcate where pCode != #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pName = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and level = 2
select count(1) from packageattcate where parentCode = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from packageattcate where pCode = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: id, entId, erpCode, pCode, pName, requiredCount, pEnName, parentCode, `status`, `level`, leafFlag, lang, creator, createDate, modifier, updateDate
mapper.insert: insert into PackageAttCate (id, entId, erpCode, pCode, pName, requiredCount, pEnName, parentCode, `status`, `level`, leafFlag, lang, creator, createDate, modifier, updateDate ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{requiredCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{leafFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.delete: delete from PackageAttCate where erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and entId = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pCode = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update:
update PackageAttCate
entId = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pCode = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pName = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pName = #{requiredCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pEnName = #{pEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentCode = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
`level` = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
leafFlag = #{leafFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update PackageAttCate set entId = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pCode = #{pCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pName = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, requiredCount = #{requiredCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pEnName = #{pEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentCode = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, leafFlag = #{leafFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
